metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45941 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: libbpf 0.6.0 and 0.6.1 has a heap-based buffer overflow (8 bytes) in __bpf_object__open (called from bpf_object__open_mem and bpf-object-fuzzer.c).

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-07-05, no details on the exact fix for this issue

criterions.comment: libbpf package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-07-05').
